function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Strengthen communication and collaboration with existing suppliers, explore other forms of value exchange","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging the use of face masks, practicing respiratory hygiene","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing specific measures to restore travelers’ certainty and encourage vacation behavior","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular calibration and verification of wearable sensor technology, combined with medical professional interpretation of data.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote critical thinking and digital literacy, fact-checking initiatives","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct thorough system integration testing, provide extensive training and support for healthcare personnel, and collaborate with experienced blockchain technology vendors.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reorganize equipment layout and implement equipment reservation system","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent handwashing)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop and implement awareness campaigns targeting the general population and key stakeholders, provide information on available resources and support
